headline: Man Utd Women v Arsenal kicks off WSL action on Sunday
summary: The Barclays Women’s Super League returns after the international break with Manchester City the leaders by a point from Chelsea. Manchester United meet Arsenal in the early match, with the hosts third and two points […]

headline: Man City appoint Therese Sjogran as Women’s Director of Football
summary: Manchester City have appointed the experienced Therese Sjogran as the club’s new Women’s Director of Football. Sjogran, who played over 200 times for Sweden and was a longtime Sporting Director at Rosengard until recently, will […]

headline: Man City Women have to come from behind to beat Aston Villa
summary: Manchester City lead the Barclays Women’s Super League after victory over Aston Villa, Chelsea overcome Spurs in entertaining encounter. Manchester City 2-1 Aston Villa Liverpool 1-1 Crystal Palace Leicester City 1-0 Everton West Ham United […]

headline: Brighton Women end Manchester United’s perfect start
summary: Manchester United go top of the Barclays Women’s Super League but with their first points dropped in a 1-1 draw away to Brighton & Hove Albion. After a poot start, Brighton improved to earn a […]

headline: WSL leadership up for grabs as Brighton Women welcome Man Utd
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion will go top of the Barclays Women’s Super League on Saturday if they beat Manchester United, for whom just a point would put them in pole position. Manchester United have won […]

headline: Jonas Eidevall resigns as Arsenal Women’s head coach
summary: Jonas Eidevall has resigned from his position as Arsenal Women’s head coach with immediate effect following a disappointing start to the campaign. He had been with the Gunners since the summer of 2021, twice winning […]

headline: ‘We looked like a WSL side today’ – Palace boss Kaminski taking heart despite Brighton loss
summary: Crystal Palace head coach Laura Kaminski felt that their performance in the 1-0 Barclays WSL home defeat to Brighton ‘shows that we deserve to be in this league.’ Newly-promoted Palace currently sit 8th in the […]

headline: Shaw double sees Man City Women overcome setback at Anfield
summary: Khadija Shaw bagged a brace as Manchester City had to battle back to beat Liverpool and go top of the Barclays Women’s Super League. Manchester United 3-0 Tottenham Hotspur Aston Villa 0-0 Leicester City Crystal […]

headline: Chelsea Women hold on to win 2-1 away to Arsenal
summary: Chelsea held off an Arsenal fightback in the Barclays Women’s Super League watched by over 45,000 at Emirates Stadium. Mayra Ramirez scored in only the fourth minute, hooking a shot over her shoulder and the […]

headline: Big derbies in Barclays Women’s Super League and Championship
summary: Arsenal versus Chelsea kicks off the weekend’s Barclays Women’s Super League action, while Sunderland and Newcastle United meet in the Championship for the first time. The Gunners and the Blues clash at the Emirates early […]
